title: Charge Up Abilities Bug
body:
Hi there.

Since patch 5.4 any champions with charge up abilities IE Vi Q, Varus Q, Sion Q and Zac E cause my ping to rocket while charging but then drops straight back after I release the button. This causes me to be unable to release the ability at the right time in most cases, basically making the champion useless.

Steps to reproduce: Play any of those champs I listed and use the ability.

Basically means I can't use my most played champ, Vi, since that patch and just wondering if there was any fix out there for anyone else who had this issue. Of all the people I play with only one other person had this bug and he just gave up on fixing it.

Thanks in advance

replies.body:
Are you talking about frame-lag or actually higher ping (check in-game with Ctrl+F)? I know that League's frames drop a bit if you're holding down a button (literally insanity), but I've never heard of such a bad case. Have you tried lowering your graphics settings and turning on your frame-cap?

What computer specs do you have?

Its actually higher ping, checking with both teamspeak and the Ctrl+F.

I run LoL at roughly 380fps and it never drops any lower then 360 for me so I'm certain its not that.
Have you tried not running/uninstalling those VoIP programs while playing/testing League? Do you have any other programs that may check for key-inputs?
I have and the issue still occurs, I even tried on a different internet connection and a different pc yet it still happens

>and a different pc

wait wut

No way. That means it's possibly a coding fault that Riot have over-looked. Unless the computers are of similar configuration.

Have you submitted a support ticket?

Yeah I put in a support ticket and I was told to post a thread here and wait for responses :\

The second pc I tried was a macbook so not even close to the first one.

Bug occurs on both pcs and on both my phone net and landline

>Yeah I put in a support ticket and I was told to post a thread here and wait for responses :\

I really wish they would stop fucking doing that, holy shit. They know more than everyone here combined, and yet they want to push all the problems away to here.

Are your graphics drivers updated? Have you tried disabling your anti-virus (remember to re-enable)?

I'm just picking out random stuff to try. No idea what one can do in this situation.

Graphics drivers I update fortnightly so thats certainly not an issue.

I did the anti-virus last night and still no luck.

I'm thinking about putting in a second ticket and hope for a better response.

Would it be worth the time?

You'll most likely get the response "Bumping your request will not make us respond faster", unless the ticket was closed and it's a different red.

You're the only person I've heard of whom is getting this problem.

Yeah I bumped it and just got told that many Riot employees view these forums daily and will respond with any useful info.

So that either means that they've been here and have nothing to say which could help or they just don't even come here
And today's patch didn't change a thing for it either
